statements: DELETE FROM motion_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp > '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM motion_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND motion_detected = TRUE;
DELETE FROM ActionsAndRoutines WHERE action_name = 'Turn on lights';
DELETE FROM MotionSensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM routines WHERE routine_name = 'Night Routine';
DELETE FROM motion_sensors WHERE id = 1 AND sensor_name = 'Living Room Sensor';
DELETE FROM Room WHERE room_name = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM Room WHERE floor_number = 3 AND room_name = 'Kitchen';
